issue.title: find_chunks in _load_seq.py does not end a chunk early at the end of a supercontig

content.raw: The `chunk_starts` and `chunk_ends` genomedata/hdf5 attributes are not updated. The attributes get updated when gaps greater than `MIN_GAP_LEN` are found. No "gaps" are detected at the beginning or end of a supercontig since Genomedata looks between already existing datapoints.
content.html: The chunk_starts and chunk_ends genomedata/hdf5 attributes are not updated. The attributes get updated when gaps greater than MIN_GAP_LEN are found. No "gaps" are detected at the beginning or end of a supercontig since Genomedata looks between already existing datapoints.
